patthana15.27:1.1_0: Sappaccayaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.27:2.1_0: Sappaccayaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.27:3.1_0: Sappaccayaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naappaccayo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
